notes.model: Threshold monitor - friction accumulates, no subtraction
notes.exit_success: Zero weight - tracked as momentum only
notes.false_success: Trust violation - LLM claimed success but failed
notes.user_negation: Low weight - still noisy after filtering
notes.request_interrupted: User hit Ctrl+C / Escape - impatience signal
notes.repeated_question: User asked same thing twice - confusion/frustration
notes.rapid_exit: Quick quit (<3 turns) after error - immediate rejection
notes.session_abandoned: High friction at end, no clean exit - gave up silently
